INSERT ALL INTO iclass ( CLASS_ID, CLASS_TITLE, CLASS_NEED, CLASS_LEVEL, CLASS_STARTDATE, CLASS_ENDDATE, CLASS_TIME, CLASS_TOTALMEMBER, CLASS_PRICE, CLASS_GOAL, CLASS_CONTENT, CLASS_TRAINERINFO, CLASS_IMAGE, CLASS_STATE, CATEGORY_ID, USER_ID ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(class_id), MAX(class_id)) + 1 FROM iclass), #{classTitle}, #{classNeed}, #{classLevel}, #{classStartDate}, #{classEndDate}, #{classTime}, #{classTotalMember}, #{classPrice}, #{classGoal}, #{classContent}, #{classTrainerInfo}, #{classImage}, 'show', 2, #{iUserVO.userId} )
INTO EXERCISE_DATE ( EXERCISE_DATE, CLASS_ID ) VALUES ( #{date.exerciseDate}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(class_id), MAX(class_id)) + 1 FROM iclass) )
INTO EXERCISE_KIND ( EXERCISE_KIND, CLASS_ID ) VALUES ( #{kind.exerciseKind}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(class_id), MAX(class_id)) + 1 FROM iclass) )

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ic.*, iu.user_nickname FROM iclass ic, iuser iu WHERE ic.user_id = iu.user_id and ic.category_id = 2 and ic.class_enddate >= sysdate ORDER BY ic.class_like DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 2

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM iclass ic, ( SELECt exkind.*, exdate.exercise_date FROM ( SELECT class_id, LISTAGG(exercise_kind, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY exercise_kind DESC) AS exercise_kind FROM exercise_kind GROUP BY class_id ) exkind, ( SELECT class_id, LISTAGG(exercise_date, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY exercise_date DESC) AS exercise_date FROM exercise_date GROUP BY class_id ) exdate WHERE exkind.class_id = exdate.class_id ) exercise WHERE ic.class_id = exercise.class_id and ic.category_id = 2 and class_enddate >= sysdate

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, classlist.* FROM ( SELECT ic.*, exercise_kind, exercise_date FROM iclass ic, ( SELECt exkind.*, exdate.exercise_date FROM ( SELECT class_id, LISTAGG(exercise_kind, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY exercise_kind DESC) AS exercise_kind FROM exercise_kind GROUP BY class_id ) exkind, ( SELECT class_id, LISTAGG(exercise_date, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY exercise_date DESC) AS exercise_date FROM exercise_date GROUP BY class_id ) exdate WHERE exkind.class_id = exdate.class_id ) exercise WHERE ic.class_id = exercise.class_id and ic.category_id = 2 and class_enddate >= sysdate ) classlist WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) WHERE RNUM > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pay, ( SELECT classlist.*, buy.buy_id FROM buy, ( SELECT ic.*, exercise.exercise_kind, exercise.exercise_date FROM iclass ic, ( SELECt exkind.*, exdate.exercise_date FROM ( SELECT class_id, LISTAGG(exercise_kind, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY exercise_kind DESC) AS exercise_kind FROM exercise_kind GROUP BY class_id ) exkind, ( SELECT class_id, LISTAGG(exercise_date, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY exercise_date DESC) AS exercise_date FROM exercise_date GROUP BY class_id ) exdate WHERE exkind.class_id = exdate.class_id ) exercise WHERE ic.class_id = exercise.class_id and ic.category_id = 2 and class_enddate >= sysdate ) classlist WHERE classlist.class_id = buy.class_id and buy.user_id = #{userId} ) buylist WHERE buylist.buy_id = pay.buy_id and pay_state = 'pay'
